law.catch_line: In Garrett County, before constructing on private property a building that will need a septic tank d...

text.section: In Garrett County, before constructing on private property a building that will need a septic tank disposal system, the person who proposes to construct the building shall obtain a septic tank permit from the Garrett County Health Department.

An applicant for a septic tank permit under this section shall submit to the Garrett County Health Department:
An application on the form that the Garrett County Health Department requires; and
A plan for the septic tank system.
Before issuing a septic tank permit, the Garrett County Health Department may inspect the site of the proposed septic tank.
If it approves the application, the Garrett County Health Department shall issue a septic tank permit.
A person may not build a septic tank in violation of this section.
A person who violates subsection (e) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $100.
